description: Ingeniero de Software enfocado en el desarrollo de soluciones escalables y eficientes. Ha integrado tecnologías innovadoras e IA generativa para potenciar funcionalidades internas. Desde 2025, forma parte del Centro de Excelencia (CoE) en IA de Cencosud.
achievements: GenAI Leadership: Spearheaded frontend engineering for Plai, a GenAI platform built with Next.js, enabling AI-powered workflows for 5+ enterprise teams.
Backend Architecture: Designed NestJS/FastAPI microservices and RESTful APIs for multiple internal platforms.
UI Systems: Engineered reusable UI systems with React and Material UI, significantly increasing internal adoption and cross-departmental usability.
AI Excellence: Championed Generative AI standards as a core member of the Center of Excellence (CoE), driving enterprise-wide AI adoption and best practices.

description: Desarrollador Full Stack enfocado en optimizar el rendimiento web y crear APIs eficientes para soluciones de scraping. Implementó interfaces responsivas y contribuyó a la expansión del SaaS a clientes en Perú.
achievements: Performance Optimization: Reduced page load times by ~20% by optimizing frontend bundles and API response times.
Data Pipelines: Built high-volume data extraction pipelines using Node.js, ensuring platform scalability for enterprise clients.
Market Expansion: Delivered critical features that enabled international scaling and successful onboarding of clients in Peru.

description: Analista de Software encargado de la gestión de proyectos, documentación y cumplimiento de plazos. Actuó como enlace con stakeholders y brindó mentoría técnica a desarrolladores junior.
achievements: Enterprise Backend: Developed business-critical services using Node.js and C# (.NET), ensuring high-quality delivery for complex projects.
Mentorship: Led code reviews and mentored junior developers, improving overall engineering standards and team velocity.
Stakeholder Coordination: Coordinated technical execution with stakeholders to ensure on-time delivery of business-critical features and alignment with roadmap goals.

description: Desarrollador Junior enfocado en la implementación de funcionalidades a medida y soporte técnico oportuno. Mejoró la mantenibilidad del código mediante buenas prácticas y documentación clara.
achievements: System Stability: Delivered production support and issue resolution, improving stability and user satisfaction.
Efficiency Gains: Built custom C# (.NET Framework) features that enhanced operational efficiency for legacy systems.
Incident Reduction: Cut resolution time by implementing clean code and better maintainability standards.

description: Desarrollador Junior enfocado en la implementación de funcionalidades a medida y soporte técnico oportuno. Mejoró la mantenibilidad del código mediante buenas prácticas y documentación clara.
achievements: Algorithm Design: Implemented an Ant Colony Optimization (ACO) algorithm in Python to solve complex routing problems (EMVRP).
Data Modeling: Leveraged NumPy and Pandas to optimize large-scale scenarios, resulting in a co-authored IEEE peer-reviewed paper.
